```{r wordle}
library(dply)
library(tidyverse)
library(curl)

words1<-"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ajnafkertesz/ada-2022-datasets/blob/main/collins-scrabble-words-2019.txt"
w1<-read_txt(words1, col_names=T)


words1<-curl("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ajnafkertesz/ada-2022-datasets/blob/main/collins-scrabble-words-2019.txt")
w1 <- read.csv(words1, header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)


words2<-"https://github.com/ajnafkertesz/ada-2022-datasets/blob/main/google-10000-english-usa-no-swears.txt"

allwords<- merge (words1, words2,by =words)

words1
```
